title: 04/28/201 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/28/201 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discussions all the options the 49ers have with the #3 overall pick and why there’s clearly one quarterback prospect that would be the best choice. He lays out a scenario that leads to Bill Belichick and the Patriots landing their franchise quarterback of the future in the draft. He also reacts to some NFL breaking news and updates his latest mock draft. Plus, Nick Wright joins the show to dispel the idea that LeBron ruined the NBA with “Super Teams.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
